titleStmt.title: A vindication of the principles of the author of the answer to the compiler of the nubes testium from the charge of popery in answer to a late pretended letter from a dissenter to the divines of the Church of England : as deceivers, and yet true, 2 Cor. 6. 8.
titleStmt.author: Gee, Edward, 1657-1730.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Gee. Cf. DNB.
